get(path, response_schema=None, *args, **kwargs)

The get function accepts a path and any other arguments that are passed to it, and then calls the _request function with the ‘get’ method. If the request is successful, the response content is parsed and added to the response object to be returned.

  • path – Specify the url of the request

  • response_schema – Specify the schema of the response
